item.description:
*** Special NOTE! ***

The New Asia Restaurant - the home of the SPRG Monthly meeting for more than 3 years - has closed its doors!  This is not a bad thing... the owner has decided it's finally time to retire, and...

It gives US a good reason to go back to the original SPRG monthly meeting format!

Back in the day, we used to move the meeting around every month trying to focus on bars and restaurants that have a reputation for Paranormal phenomena.  We're kicking this change off by holding the next Meeting at La Festa restaurant in Dover.  Although there are only a few paranormal claims we've heard about this place, the food is AMAZING!  If you want to hang out with the members of a few of New Hampshire's best ghost hunting groups in a place someone has reported as actually being haunted, here's your chance!

*** ***

The monthly dinner meetings are primarily non-mandatory networking events. Although we talk business updates sometimes for half an hour or so and occasionally play evidence clips, these events are for discussion, event/investigation planning, asking questions, telling your own stories, etc. They're so we can all have a little unpressured time as a group.
item.how_to_find_us: We usually sit at a table in the back private room.
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group Monthly Meetup
